item.title: 16. About letting go. I am talking about haircuts.

item.title: 15. Time to test drive the new year resolutions. Or is it too soon for that shiz?

item.title: 13. About what they don’t tell you about wearing a saree. And it’s correlation with life.
item.description: If life gives you nine yards of silk cloth, what do you do. Do whatever you do, but do not go iron it. Like I did.

item.description: I am out of words. I guess I exhausted all of them while I was introducing myself to all the new people I met last week. Buy my thoughts…

item.title: 2. Just go ahead and break all the plates.
item.description: You know that moment. When the plate crashes on the floor. Tinkkktaakkkkchhh. I replay that moment as a stranger sitting over another…

item.title: 1. The last week of the semester. (I am starting to blog, again)
item.description: This is that weird time of the year. Where assignments feel like bad relationships you can’t get out. Where you wait and double check…
